00071 
00084     public Node(int nodeId, double nodeX, double nodeY, int nodeDemand) 
00085     {
00086         id = nodeId;
00087         x = nodeX;
00088         y = nodeY;
00089         demand = nodeDemand;
00090         inRoute = -1; // node is not assigned to any route yet
00091         isInterior = false; // initially, all nodes are exterior ones
00092         route = null; // initially, there is no route associated to the node
00093     }
00094

00103     }

00143     }

00153     {
00154         isInterior = value;

00244     public String toString() 
00245     {
00246         String s = "";
00247         s = s.concat(this.getId() + " ");
00248         s = s.concat(this.getX() + " ");
00249         s = s.concat(this.getY() + " ");
00250         s = s.concat(this.getDemand() + "");
00251         return s;
